info.name: Davíð Phuong Xuan Nguyen
info.about:
Hi, my name is Davíð.
I'm a 22 years old software engineering student at the University of Iceland. Located in Reykjavik, I'm an everything software and technology enthusiast.

content.title: LS Retail
content.subtitle: Developer
content.description: I was hired as a summer intern developer at LS Retail and was lucky enough to get handed a very real project. My task was integrating SAP Business One HANA (ERP-solution) with our point-of-sale solution LS One. I worked mostly in .NET with C#.

content.title: University of Iceland
content.subtitle: Teaching assistant
content.description:
In the fall of 2018, I was a teaching assistant for an introduction course in programming at the University of Iceland.
The course used Java to introduce basic practices in computer programming.

content.title: Isavia
content.subtitle: Passenger service
content.description:
I worked in passenger service at Keflavik Airport, in the summer of 2017.
Our responsibility there was, e.g. to help passangers, assist with passenger flow control, manage the service desks and more.

content.title: Esja Gæðafæði
content.subtitle: General worker
content.description:
My first ever job was at a meat processing company and I worked there for 4 summers, while I was in junior collage.
I did all kinds of things there, from packaging to making hamburgers and much more.

content.title: University of Iceland
content.subtitle: BSc Software Engineering
content.description: I went straight to university after having finsihed junior collage and chose to study software engineering. I currently have one year left before I receive my BSc degree.

content.title: Reykjavik Junior College
content.subtitle: ‘Stúdentspróf‘
content.description:
I attended Reykjavik Junior Collage with focus on math and physics.
After four years I received my 'Stúdentspróf' there, which corresponds roughly to A-levels or a High School Diploma.

content.title: Vrúmm
content.subtitle: App Android/iOS
content.description:
In the summer of 2018, me and my friend created the app Vrúmm. It was released in the beginning of 2019, for both iOS and Android.
Vrúmm is a platform for users to sell and buy cars. Users can create an advertisement for a car, browse other cars and message users through the app.
